title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - March 2019
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided Android/Pixel security updates for March 2019. All Pixel devices running Android 9 will receive these software updates as part of the March OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update with the latest features.

To find out in detail what has been updated, check out the official update here.

Overview :
Target Devices : All Pixel phones
Build Number : PQ2A.190305.002
Notable fixes:
Storage performance improvements
Camera performance improvements
Netflix loading over wifi improvements


Details of updates are found in this link :
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin/pixel

For more details and to learn how to check a device's security patch level, see Check and update your Android version.

Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
